## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Triglyceride + 3H2O -&gt; Glycerol C₃H₈O₃. or C3H5(OH)3 + 3Fatty Acids

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Oil|
|Form:|Liquid|
